overview: Robert Wilhelm has over 25 years of experience in venture capital, mergers & acquisitions, business development and entrepreneurship. He is also a partner at the growth capital Crossmedia Fund at Van den Ende & Deitmers Venture Capital Partners. He was the founding managing partner of NeSBIC CTe Fund, a value added venture capital group investing in early stage technology companies in Europe and USA, that he founded in 1997. He was previously a Senior Executive Mergers & Acquisitions of the pan European telecommunications joint venture Unisource NV for 4 years. Prior to Unisource, he had over 5 years of international venture capital experience at Atlas Venture in Amsterdam and Boston. He has an MBA from Rotterdam School of Management / Erasmus University and a Masters Degree in Law from the University of Amsterdam. He is an active and committed member of the board of several companies.

degrees.subject: Business / Finance
degrees.institution: Rotterdam School of Management / Erasmus University
